text.text: The name Coniagas spells out the key products: Cobalt, Nickel, Silver, and Arsenic. Over a century ago, a handful of prospects in the back country of Ontario grew into a vertically integrated producer of specialized metal products shipped around the globe. Once again demand for critical metals has gripped the world and the name Coniagas marks a return to form.

The resurrected team of Coniagas are regional veterans who understand both the local geology and the imperative of the energy transition. The company combines world class battery metal deposits and a capable metallurgical process with the expertise to produce.
